testimonialsExperts.text: Bitcoin is going to be digital gold. In order to be a part of crypto you need to understand crypto and there is no better place to do it than pm academy. Great public service

testimonialsExperts.position: Ex-hedge fund manager and CEO of Galaxy Investment
